meanings.definition: Loose-fitting trousers worn by both men and women, typically with a drawstring waist.
meanings.sent1: I like to wear my comfy pyjamas to bed.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new set of pyjamas for the pajama party.
meanings.sent3: The pyjamas were so big on him, he looked like a walking pillow.
meanings.sent4: Her pyjamas were like a cozy cloud hugging her legs.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pyjamas stood out in the sea of plain sleepwear.

meanings.definition: A pair of loose-fitting trousers and a jacket worn for sleeping in.
meanings.sent1: Every night, she puts on her soft pyjamas before going to sleep.
meanings.sent2: He forgot to pack his pyjamas for the overnight stay.
meanings.sent3: The cat snuggled up in the pyjamas left on the chair.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight danced on her silk pyjamas as she slept peacefully.
meanings.sent5: The worn-out pyjamas held memories of countless dreams within their threads.
